directions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Start melting dark chocolate pieces in a pan on low heat; it won't take long to melt. If you want a sweet cherry taste, throw a handful into the pot once chocolate has melted.
Note: The serving size is for melted chocolate, so if you measure out the pieces beforehand, allow more chips to be added than the recommended amount.

Place a teaspoon of melted chocolate on parchment paper; top with a small handful of almonds. Drizzle almonds with one tablespoon melted chocolate. Repeat process with remaining almonds and chocolate until your pan is full.
Sprinkle coconut shavings over each tiny delight.
Transfer to refrigerator for about 10 minutes to chill and remove them when firm. They'll be ready to enjoy right away!
ingredients: 1 cup plus 3 tablespoons melted dark chocolate
title: Paleo Dark Chocolate Nut Clusters
